description: Try our easy to follow Granola, Cottage Cheese, Berry and Coconut Cup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Granola, Cottage Cheese, Berry and Coconut Cup
name: Granola, Cottage Cheese, Berry and Coconut Cup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Layer some cottage cheese and honey, then granola, berries and repeat in that order and finish with shredded mint and toasted coconut.
